means: 购买，购得( buy的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_cn: 一批投资商从政府手中买下墨西哥电信公司。

sentence.Network_en: I went to Brooks Brothers and bought myself a decent shirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 我去布鲁克斯兄弟专卖店给自己买了一件体面的衬衫。

sentence.Network_en: She bought Ann two bras and six pairs of knickers.
sentence.Network_cn: 她给安买了两件胸罩、6条内裤。
